data.name: Lok'tar ogar!
data.description: The orcs roar their war cry, seeking conquest. Show your strength and defeat 1 000 orcs in battle.

data.name: Feather Me Impressed
data.description: The legend of the endless flock beckons. Prove your might (and appetite) by slaughtering 5 000 chickens.

data.name: Novice
data.description: Every hero starts somewhere. Reach level 10 and step onto the path of adventure.

data.name: Tasks Farmer
data.description: Complete 100 tasks and show your diligence to the people of the realm.

data.name: Ecologist
data.description: The world breathes easier thanks to your efforts. Recycle 1 000 items.

data.name: Cabinet Maker
data.description: Spruce wood is prized by craftsmen. Craft 500 spruce planks and become a master cabinet maker.

data.name: Worker
data.description: Iron bars build civilizations. Craft 500 iron bars and earn your place among the workers.

data.name: Mithril Mastery
data.description: Legends are forged in mithril. Craft 500 mithril bars to prove your mastery.

data.name: Amateur Miner
data.description: Copper glimmers in the veins of the earth. Gather 6 000 copper ores and begin your mining journey.

data.name: Miner
data.description: Iron shapes kingdoms. Gather 6 000 iron ores to build your legacy.

data.name: Expert Miner
data.description: Gold is the prize of experts. Gather 6 000 gold ores and shine above the rest.

data.name: Intermediate Miner
data.description: Coal fuels progress. Gather 6 000 coals and power the world.

data.name: Professional Miner
data.description: Mithril ore is the dream of miners. Gather 6 000 mithril ores and reach professional status.

data.name: Amateur Lumberjack
data.description: Ash wood is the first step to mastery. Gather 6 000 ash woods and begin your lumberjack career.

data.name: Lumberjack
data.description: Spruce forests echo with the sound of axes. Gather 6 000 spruce woods and earn the title of Lumberjack.

data.name: Intermediate Lumberjack
data.description: Birch trees test your skill. Gather 6 000 birch woods to master your craft.

data.name: Expert Lumberjack
data.description: Dead wood holds secrets of the forest. Gather 6 000 dead woods and prove your expertise.

data.name: Professional Lumberjack
data.description: Maple wood is the true professional’s choice. Gather 6 000 maple woods.

data.name: Amateur Fisherman
data.description: The river’s bounty starts with the humble gudgeon. Gather 6 000 gudgeons and learn the fisherman's path.

data.name: Fisherman
data.description: Shrimp swarm the shallows. Gather 6 000 shrimps and prove your skill as a fisherman.

data.name: Intermediate Fisherman
data.description: The swift trout challenges all but the best. Gather 6 000 trouts and rise in the ranks.

data.name: Expert Fisherman
data.description: The elusive bass is the pride of expert anglers. Gather 6 000 bass.

data.name: Professional Fisherman
data.description: Salmon run strong in wild rivers. Gather 6 000 salmons and become a professional fisherman.

data.name: Amateur Alchemist
data.description: Sunflowers are the base of every potion. Gather 6 000 sunflowers and start your journey as an alchemist.

data.name: Intermediate Alchemist
data.description: Nettle leaves sting the unwary. Gather 6 000 nettle leaves and brew stronger potions.

data.name: Expert Alchemist
data.description: Glowstem leaves illuminate the darkest recipes. Gather 6 000 glowstems and master your craft.

data.name: Pearl Fisher
data.description: Small pearls shimmer in the deep. Gather 500 Small Pearls and become a true pearl fisher.

data.name: Master Lumberjack
data.description: Amidst the scorching desert, even palm trees fall to the axe. Gather 6 000 Palm Wood as a master lumberjack.

data.name: Master Fisherman
data.description: The seas hold countless challenges. Prove your mastery by gathering 6 000 Swordfish.

data.name: Master Miner
data.description: Deep within the earth lies strength unyielding. Gather 6 000 Adamantite Ore to prove yourself as a master miner.

data.name: Master Alchemist
data.description: Even the desert yields secrets to the wise. Gather 6 000 Torch Cactus Flowers as a master alchemist’s triumph.

data.name: Restoring The Peace
data.description: The forests tremble under the claws of Bandit Lizards. Restore peace to the woodland by slaying 1 000 of these marauders.

data.name: King of the Forest
data.description: Only those who face the wild's fiercest predators earn the title. Slay 2 000 wolves to become King of the Forest.

data.name: Closing The Gate
data.description: Demons pour forth from shattered portals, threatening all life. Seal the rift and defeat 1 000 demons.

data.name: Lich Please!
data.description: The ancient Lich rules the dead lands, defying the living. Challenge fate and defeat the Lich to restore balance.

data.name: I want bacon!
data.description: The farms overflow with squealing pigs. Satisfy your hunger for glory (and bacon) by slaughtering 2 500 pigs.

data.name: Cult Destroyer
data.description: The Cult Emperor weaves dark rituals, threatening the realm. End his blasphemous reign by defeating the Cult Emperor.

data.name: Adventurer
data.description: Your journey continues as you grow in strength. Reach level 30 and become a true adventurer.

data.name: The New Bandit
data.description: Claim the mantle of the forest's outlaws. Drop a Bandit Armor and show your new allegiance.

data.name: Arachnophobia Conquered
data.description: Face your fears and clear the webs! Defeat 1 000 spiders to conquer your arachnophobia.

data.name: Making a Nether portal
data.description: Obsidian bars are the gateway to forbidden realms. Craft 250 obsidian bars.

data.name: Maple Maestro
data.description: Maple wood is the choice of virtuosos. Craft 500 maple planks and become a Maple Maestro.

data.name: Catch and Cook
data.description: From river to table: craft 500 cooked salmons and show your skill as both angler and chef.

data.name: Sweet as Pie
data.description: Apple pies are the delight of every feast. Craft 250 apple pies and spread sweetness everywhere.

data.name: Strange Miner
data.description: Some ores defy explanation. Gather 3 000 strange ores and uncover their mysteries.

data.name: Magic Lumberjack
data.description: Magic wood pulses with energy. Gather 6 000 magic woods and touch the arcane.

data.name: Alchemist
data.description: Minor health potions save lives. Craft 250 minor health potions and show your mastery of the arts.

data.name: Cursed Wood, Blessed Victory
data.description: Cursed wood is dangerous to handle, but it brings victory to the brave. Craft 50 Cursed Planks.

data.name: Recall Forever
data.description: Home is never far with magic on your side. Use 500 recall potions and journey without fear.

data.name: The French Cheese
data.description: A good meal starts with cheese. Use 1 000 cheeses and savor the taste of France.
